history.proof: unfold lb_meet, lb_join, lb_mask_equiv in *. srun best use: lb_meet_spec, lb_meet_dec_left, lb_join_inc_left, lb_mask_refl unfold: lb_meet, lb_join.

original: unfold lb_meet, lb_join, lb_mask_equiv in *. intros. rewrite lb_meet_assoc. rewrite lb_meet_eq with (x:=a) (y:=(a ↑ b)) (x0:=a) (y0:=b). reflexivity.
